section.title: What is Divvun?
section.p: Divvun is a project run by the Sámi Parliament in order to make spell checkers for the Sámi languages. In the first phase of the project this means spell checkers and hyphenation for Northern Sámi, and spell checkers for Lule Sámi - the background for this prioritising is found on this page. The tools will work on Windows, Linux and Mac, with the usual office environment programs.

section.title: Anonymous cvs
section.p: The source code to this project is open source, and it is available through anonymous cvs. We have also written a document on how to find your way through the source code.

section.title: Download documentation
section.p: All the documentation on this project is available on this site. If you would like to have this documentation on your own computer, follow the instruction on anonymous cvs, then go on to setup forrest. After that all our documentation sits on your own computer, and you can navigate through it with a web browser.
